verses.name: Leviticus 14:1
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.name: Leviticus 14:2
verses.text: This shall be the law of the leper in the day of his cleansing: He shall be brought unto the priest:

verses.name: Leviticus 14:3
verses.text: And the priest shall go forth out of the camp; and the priest shall look, and, behold, if the plague of leprosy be healed in the leper;

verses.name: Leviticus 14:4
verses.text: Then shall the priest command to take for him that is to be cleansed two birds alive and clean, and cedar wood, and scarlet, and hyssop:

verses.name: Leviticus 14:5
verses.text: And the priest shall command that one of the birds be killed in an earthen vessel over running water:
